message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. Would you like to buy it from me for $180?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate your enthusiasm. However, I am only willing to pay $150 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $150 is a good price for you, but I was thinking more along the lines of $170. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I am still not able to go above $150 for this product. I hope we can find a price that works for both of us.
